TopicTitle: KerbalCentral.com introduces Official KMP Server List - servers.kerbalcentral.com

Articles.Content:
In one of the first essential projects of Kerbal Central, we have finally provided the community with an up to date and maintained KMP server list:

http://servers.kerbalcentral.com

With Jumba apparently not returning to KMP anytime soon, godarklight of the KMP project has graciously developed a simple server list which we are in the process of hosting. Admins are welcome to manage their own server listing. It only lists servers that are currently up. Feel free to register and list your servers today. Your pwds are hashed for security, but as with all things, dont give us a pwd that you don't want lost. If you run into issues, please contact godarklight.

What is Kerbal Central?

We are just getting started as a fan-based community, and as such have not formally introduced ourselves to General Discussion and elsewhere. Before KerbalCentral.com officially launches we have a lot of work to do. Our three top priorities are to get a stable KMP server list published, an alternative to Spaceport (possibly spaceport.kerbalcentral.com), and a forum to manage Kerbal Central discussion. We could use volunteers who are familiar with php, css, html, and managing a Wordpress engine, forums, etc, as this project exists for the fans of KSP and is totally managed by them. If you are a fan of KSP, this is your community. We'd love your input in this thread as well.

Kerbal Central is offering subdomains to 24/7 KMP and community admins:

If your server is 24/7, or you run a Kerbal website, you are welcome to request a kerbalcentral.com subdomain CNAME redirect:

yourname.kerbalcentral.com

Static server admins simply post below your static ip or dns with your desired subdomain.

Any dynamic server admin that wants a KerbalCentral.com subdomain redirect, simply sign up at noip.com and then install, configure, and run ddclient from a linux vmware box to update your noip DNS automatically. Post below your noip dns and if appropriate, I'll create a subdomain.kerbalcentral.com for you (you choose) as a CNAME record, and bam, you've got a nice kerbalized DNS for your dynamic KMP server such as yourservernamehere.kerbalcentral.com and you will help promote the community. I am not sure how long I'll be able to offer management of such, so request your subdomain today to reserve it.

Some applications may be rejected if they are inappropriate, or are reserved by Kerbal Central.

Kerbal Central is a project offered for free to the community.

Edited January 30, 2014 by inigma
Is it actually official, i.e. has been approved of by KMP devs?

Is it actually official, i.e. has been approved of by KMP devs?

Its developed and run by godarklight, a KMP dev, yes. Gimp is in the process of updating references to it too.

Edited January 30, 2014 by inigma
Great! As soon as I get my server running, I'll add it there!
